title: Prof. Hsieh joins the Editorial Board of Communications Earth & Environment
Prof. Hsieh's paper receives the 2022 ES&T Best Paper Award
Prof. Hsieh writes a column on retiring batteries and vehicle networking for Critical Reviews (關鍵評論網)
Prof. Hsieh promoted to Associate Professor
Prof. Hsieh wins the Outstanding Teaching Award (教學傑出獎) at NTU
Congratulations to Yu-Shin Hu for winning the Best Innovation Paper at iCHE2024!
